## AlStopwatch.repeatedly() method

A static method to generate a timer that will execute intermittently. Note that this implementation deviates from the behavior of setInterval by \*defaulting\* to firing the timer immediately.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static repeatedly(callback: {
        (): void;
    }, interval?: number, beginImmediately?: boolean): AlStopwatch;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | <code>{</code><br/><code>        (): void;</code><br/><code>    }</code> |  |
|  interval | <code>number</code> |  |
|  beginImmediately | <code>boolean</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`AlStopwatch`
